name: PLANK! (itch)
description:
Submission for the Minimalistic Game Jam 2!

What could be more minimalistic that a tribute to one of the first videogames ever? The most primal, basic and minimalistic concept of videogaming:

"Paddles and ball" PONG (ATARI, 1975)

Plank is just a survival mode Arkanoid clone, pretty unfinished, this is just a prototype.  Click & Drag the paddle

Classic power ups, try to hold your lives counter.

Things go crazy and insane!

Also have fun with the totally irreverent music and sound FX :)

Stay safe! 

Technical info/Issues

Versión 1.0.02

Still working on the (linux/Android/mac) probably released post-jam.

 It's cocos2D so it's like baking the same thing, 4 times right? :)

This game features dedicated window area without artifacts or browser stuff whatsover intromission in the gameplay or visual experience. contrary to what browser games do, plus a neat and honest CPU/GPU usage.

Runs no matter combination of browser/OS/CPU you have!
